about_the_game:
This is the complement to the Gunmetal Arcadia Zero OST, effectively the second part of a two-disc set. Together they comprise the complete soundtrack to Gunmetal Arcadia. This soundtrack contains over 40 minutes of original music.

01. Hostile Configurations (1:45)
02. Trick Shot (1:23)
03. Harm (0:58)
04. Thousand-Yard Zen (1:16)
05. Burn Ward (1:07)
06. Fatalism (2:21)
07. Downcycle (0:45)
08. Run Faster (1:12)
09. The Firewood Blues (1:41)
10. Edison (0:47)
11. Pensive (1:21)
12. Time, No (0:47)
13. Sick Burst (1:22)
14. Trails (1:15)
15. All Smiles (0:54)
16. Facets (0:48)
17. Thanks for Holding (0:51)
18. Glowing (2:15)
19. No Battle Lost (1:09)
20. Bristles (1:17)
21. Evergreen (1:48)
22. Corridors (0:30)
23. Earn Your Hooks (0:54)
24. Too Many Factors (0:47)
25. Arc Prime (2:53)
26. Premonition (1:39)
27. Flattering (1:08)
28. Sways (2:22)
29. Ever the Wayfarer (1:13)
30. Ten Twenty-Eight (2:02)

All music by J. Kyle Pittman.
